original_title: Aubrey Plaza is ‘functioning,’ but it’s a ‘daily struggle’ after her husband’s death | CNN
article_summary: "Aubrey Plaza discusses her grief following the suicide of her husband, Jeff Baena, on Amy Poehler's podcast 'Good Hang.' Plaza compares her grief to the film 'The Gorge,' describing it as an 'alien movie' filled with 'monster people.'"</s>
